attributes.action: keep open the Trevu Childrens' Centre in Camborne, Cornwall and allow vital services for families to continue to run from there.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Centre is due to close in September 2009 and the building is being sold. If the closure goes ahead it will be a great loss to the town and will particularly hit young families in the area.
